subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Chien-Ming Wang threw 25 pitches in his first throwing session off a bullpen mound since hurting his foot in June. “It’s better,” Wang said after the session in Tampa, Fla. “It’s good.” Wang partly tore a tendon and sprained his right foot running the bases.
